DataSource.Query: SELECT checkouts.value_date, checkouts.book_date, purchase.purchases.purchase_id, suppliers.supplier_name, inventory.get_store_name_by_store_id(checkout_details.store_id) AS store, items.item_name, checkout_details.quantity, units.unit_code, checkout_details.price, checkout_details.discount, ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) - inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS sub_total, ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) + inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS total FROM purchase.purchases JOIN inventory.checkouts ON purchase.purchases.checkout_id = checkouts.checkout_id JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkouts.checkout_id = checkout_details.checkout_id JOIN inventory.items ON checkout_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON checkout_details.unit_id = units.unit_id JOIN finance.transaction_master ON inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id LEFT JOIN inventory.suppliers ON purchase.purchases.supplier_id = inventory.suppliers.supplier_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND checkouts.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND checkouts.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@ItemId, 0) = 0 OR items.item_id = @ItemId) AND (COALESCE(@BrandId, 0) = 0 OR items.brand_id = @BrandId);
